hero.title: LocalAI
tagline: Every day, Vietnamese builders turn ideas into AI products.
This is where you discover, support, or become one of them.

automations.title: How it works
automations.description: Just 3 steps to get your AI product in front of thousands of Vietnamese users.

steps.title: Create an account
steps.desc: Sign up free in 30 seconds. Google and GitHub supported.

steps.title: Publish your AI product
steps.desc: Add details, demo images, and links. The LocalAI team reviews within 24h.

steps.title: Get discovered
steps.desc: Show up on the homepage for votes, reviews, and shares from the AI community.

security.title: Why choose LocalAI?
security.description: Built by the community, for the Vietnamese AI community.

benefits.title: Free forever
benefits.desc: Explore and list products at no cost. We believe in growing the AI VN community.

benefits.title: Strong community
benefits.desc: Connect with thousands of developers, founders, and AI users in Vietnam.

benefits.title: More visibility
benefits.desc: Your product reaches the right audience—people actively seeking AI solutions.

benefits.title: Made in Vietnam
benefits.desc: Proudly showcasing Vietnamese AI to the world. Bilingual Vietnamese-English.
